website_summaries.verdict: This unique product is a savvy pick for customers wanting a spray mop with reusable pads.
pros: Includes 2 reusable bottles for an eco-friendly design
Manual spray handle eliminates need for batteries
cons: Bottle can be a difficult to fasten onto the mop

customer_reviews.title: ) Otherwise have no issues with the mop and think we will like it.
customer_reviews.text: Simply providing correct (as opposed to incorrect) directions to remove bottle would have saved much heartache, time and pulled hair. ("PUSH DOWN FIRMLY AND TWIST TO THE RIGHT TO REMOVE" must refer to a previous model, makes ABSOLUTELY NO SENSE here. . Basically pulling hard along shaft gets it out, possibly squeezing the bottle from the sides at the same time might help. (Had to search thru comments to find this out eventually.) Otherwise have no issues with the mop and think we will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed - Durable - Excellent Mist Feature - Handle is a Bit Small
customer_reviews.text: This mop is well constructed and feels sturdy and durable. The Spray Mist is good - it is evenly dispersed mist that shoots 3 feet in front of the mop head - just the right distance amount to get floor wet in front of you to properly clean. I like that it came with an extra bottle and 2 extra cleaning pads. The handle is a little small for my hand it may have been designed for smaller hands - a larger handle would give me more leverage to move it around easier and faster. other than that - it is very well made. I would recommend this mop, but they might think about making the handle more ergonomic.
customer_reviews.author: Concierge2000@710

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this mop! It is easy to use and works well. We have new vinyl flooring in our house that looks like hardwood or Pergo. The manufacturer recommended a specific cleaning product that I am able to poor into the bottle of the mop. The handle squeezes easily and sprays the liquid where I need it to go. Three microfiber heads came with the mop and they stick absolutely securely to the base. And they are machine washable. Sometimes I have trouble keeping the head aligned properly as I mop, but I’m getting the hang of it and it is definitely a plus to have a swivel head. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these mops for my work. We were originally using a swiffer and I wanted something more eco-friendly. I purchased this, and after 3 weeks it broke. We duct-taped it together. It maybe lasted another month before it completely fell apart. I took it as a fluke, I thought maybe one of my staff members was being rough on the mop. So I purchased another, figuring I already had purchased additional mop heads and shouldn't waste all that $$. MISTAKE! This mop again just fell apart after a month of use! Mid-swipe the pole pushed down into the body of the mop and all of the plastic snapped! SO CHEAP!
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Breaks too easily
customer_reviews.text: This product broke multiple times for me. It was replaced once, but I was ignored after that. It seems the "lifetime" warranty I was promised is a fraud. I've contacted them multiple times with no luck. The bottles leak constantly, the pieces holding the mop together broke in various places and the nozzle shooting the cleaning solution would consistently not spray fully. Not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: JonathonR

customer_reviews.title: Do no recc for hardwood/bamboo floors but if using on tile would be good. Refill containers will hold about 1 pint worth ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a microfiber material, very rough and hard plastic pieces sticking out of "microfiber mop head". Would def scractch hard wood floors or anykind. Do no recc for hardwood/bamboo floors but if using on tile would be good. Refill containers will hold about 1 pint worth of liquid, they are super small.
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye standard mop!
customer_reviews.text: No more lugging mops and buckets of water. It cleans really well, dries super fast, and you can add any chemicals you want. I wish I could give it 5 stars, but the only problem is the joint between the handle and mop. This should've been a BALL joint to allow the mop to swivel 360 degrees and stay flat on the floor. Instead, it's a semi-fixed joint that makes it tilt from the side, forcing you to constantly lower it back down and push perfectly back and forth to keep it level. Extra work that could easily be fixed with a better part.
customer_reviews.author: Corin

customer_reviews.title: Better than the high priced brand.
customer_reviews.text: Better than the high priced brand. I really like the idea of using your own cleaner and polish. The pads are long lasting and work very good.I keep one pad with wax and one for mopping. The waxing pad when not on the mop i keep in a zip bag so I can change from mopping to waxing in just seconds. The price is also a lot better than the others. Yup I do recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Woodman34

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to disposable solution bottles and pads
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this to replace a Swiffer Wet Jet that had gone bad. Once I figured out how to get the handle fully inserted into the lower portion to enable the spray trigger to work, the mop performed very well. I've filled the bottle with a dilute Simple Green solution for our tile bathroom floors, and so far it seems to be exactly what we needed. I suspect this will more than pay for itself in a short time of use. On another note, customer service was outstanding: rapid and helpful response that could have just as easily boiled down to RTFM.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Best mop that's come into my life
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this product! It's great if you have family that makes a mess every day and you dont want to bring out a mop and bucket out every time. I bought this because of my dogs. Its soooooo much easier it bring this out: spray, mop and be done. It's easier on my hands than having to twist a mop and wash it in the sink when I'm done. You can just stick these in the washer and your ready to go again. I haven't had problems with leaking ever. It's great that it comes with two bottles that you can fill with your own solution. It saves me on water and soap.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy-peasy
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop! No dirty mop water, no squeezing out a stringy mop, doesn't take up a lot of space. I actually mop every day! I do take the pads off every day and wash them out, but it's simple. The ONLY negative comment I have is the bottle is a little difficult to remove. I have tried pushing down and turning it to the right as I am looking at it straight on and I have tried pushing down and twisting while looking down at it. I get aggravated and just wiggle it and it comes out, but then it's my gosh, which way did I twist it? Luckily, it isn't necessary to change the bottle very often!
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Solution would not spray after assembly
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together following the instructions, however after filling one bottle with solution and trying to spray it would not spray at all. So i decided to try the other bottle and it worked just fine. Like other reviews it was difficult to remove bottle from base , I did push down and turned to right as per directions. I hope the spray bottle that works continues to do so because i have already disposed of box .
customer_reviews.author: J. Groves

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Mop Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop! It’s so easy to use and I can choose my cleaner. Under normal use, this one has lasted over 2 years. My previous one met a terrible demise when I tried to teach my 8-year-old son to mop. I left him to finish and he thought it would be fun to pretend like he was curling. That much force broke it into several pieces, but luckily another one was just a Prime away! I didn’t even want consider a different one. He learned a good lesson too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Slaback

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have ever made. This is a game changing purchase for keeping your house clean. I can't believe the mop I was using before this one was even allowed to be sold. Totally worthless and time consuming. This mop is a dream come true. I knew I wanted two bottles so I could have hardwood floor cleaner in one and tile floor cleaner in the other. You can feel and see the floors becoming clean when you use this. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great mop.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mop at a great price. The pads are very thick, easy to wash, and pick a lot up. Because the pads are thick the little dips in the floor are easily cleaned, unlike the thin pads of the Swiffer. I always had to push very hard with the Swiffer to get everything. The bottles are easy to fill. They are a little hard to get in and out the first time they are used, but not after you get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: no microfiber
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this after reading many reviews, but I'm very disappointed. The description states microfiber but they are NOT- the inserts states the mops are made out of some type of carbon??? They feel like they are made of plastic. I don't see how they can be absorbent and I am worried they will scratch my floors. In addition the fluid bottles are SMALL. I can see why the product ships with two. They would be needed. It will likely be going back.
customer_reviews.author: 'A'   Student

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF MY GREATEST DECISIONS TO PURCHASE :)
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this floor cleaner. I can honestly say I don't know how this product has received any negative feed back. I have a huge busy family..so you can imagine how much we depend on this contraption. The bonus is the only cost is for the purchase and not there after. The pads are washable, the decent size containers are refillable...and the brush/pad cleaner is a great attachment. I highly recommend this product to use in a home.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Chavez

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a lot of floor to mop but someday I will. I like that it comes with extra cleaning pads because that comes in handy. the bottle sprayer works well and it even has an extra spray bottle just in case... I thought it was a good purchase for the price. We use a different version of this in my special needs classroom so I wanted one at home too.
customer_reviews.author: Lemons

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is a cheaper alternative. I waited for out of you because I wanted to make sure I use that multiple times I have currently had this mop for about 4 months I use it every single day. It makes popping Muffler extremely easy I love the ability to put my own cleaning solution into the bottle. The microfiber pads wash and dry extremely easy. I would highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last
customer_reviews.text: I clean vacation homes, once a week. Loved this mop when I got it, the mop pad had scrubby bits that work awesome on tile. Was great for a month or so. Then it started to deteriorate. The front piece cracked where the bottle meets the metal pole and then it just crumbled. I have to push down on the bottle for it to spray. I had to tape the whole unit together just so I could use it.
customer_reviews.author: DLeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a more expensive Bona wood floor mop and did not like it. I bought this mop hoping to make the work easier. This mop is by far a superior product. Sprays evenly and the handle does not catch when depressed. Reusable (3) pads are thicker making application easier and more even. Hated the edges on the Bona - hurt your hand. I am very impressed with this product. Would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R.

customer_reviews.title: Best of three I've tried so far
customer_reviews.text: This is my third attempt at finding a good indoor spray mop. This one is light years better than the previous two, both of which broke with minimal pressure. The refill bottle is great, and the fact that you get an extra one is fantastic, as it means you don't have to stop everything to refill. The pads that come with it are as good as any I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: David Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Clogged dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Either this mop already arrived with the clogged dispenser or got clogged after the first use, I have no way of knowing. With all the amount of blowing and cleaning of the dispenser, I never got it to work - the mop ended up in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Ilya Gutman

customer_reviews.title: This works great. The mop itself is lightweight and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great. The mop itself is lightweight and easy to maneuver. I bought this because I was tired of replacing our Swiffer's pads and solution. Not to mention, I also hated using the chemical-filled solution that you were forced to use with the Swiffer. With this product, I'm able to make my own solution and can just throw the pads into the wash and reuse. The first time my husband (who was very much against buying this) said, "Wow, this works awesome!" We're both very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Buy this it’s great
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this had it up and working I used it on my hard wood floors and stands and book case and my leather Furnature , then bathroom floor then path to outside I have three Rottweilers ! It’s muddy outside and I’m sitting here all done and relaxed ! Just took me maybe 20 minutes ! Loving this
customer_reviews.author: frank kirstatter

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my Swiffer wet jet. It is so easy to use and most of all saves money. I mop my kitchen and living room almost daily. It does great on both the ceramic tile and the laminate. I love being able to use my own mop solution, I do however remove the bottle when I am done mopping and make sure the sprayer is empty...to avoid any clogging problems. So glad I found this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Junglejoyce

customer_reviews.title: Bottles from H#LL
customer_reviews.text: First day...seemed nice...can build and take apart for travel.....but bottles are incredibly difficult to remove which then creates leakage. The instructions to remove the bottle are worthless. Found from other comments that you need to pull straight up to release the bottle. I do not know if this will decrease the life span of the mop/bottles or not. Incredibly difficult and bad instruction with the mop both written booklet and on the actual bottles. I hope it will work and will last.
customer_reviews.author: Wholigan

customer_reviews.title: Large mop head covers a lot of surface well!
customer_reviews.text: This covers a large surface because of the size of the mop head and it swivels well in corners and cleans the well. I use it multiple times a day in my kitchen, bathrooms, and hallway. Theo my issue is taking the squirt bottle out, it can be very difficult at times.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Better
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the swifter crap. I hated the wipe material for the swifter and the soggy at the bottom full of fluid box. This is the answer. Fill it with what you want spray as much as you want and wash the pads. Just wish it was metal instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Private Person

customer_reviews.title: Great mop. Great value. My kids have FUN mopping now!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mop system. I love that you can fill the containers with whatever cleaning solution you choose. My kids actually enjoy mopping now because of this mop. They like squirting out the soap and chasing it around the kitchen. The washable microfiber cloths have held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Strahan

customer_reviews.title: Also this is a GREAT kit for the money
customer_reviews.text: The longer handle on the mop makes it easier to clean up. Our other mop had a short handle and we had to always slump over the mop which was very tiring. Also this is a GREAT kit for the money.
customer_reviews.author: JACQUELINE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It's the perfect size for our floors. I really like that I can use my own floor cleaner, water mix. Comfortable to use, no straining to squeeze out a mop nor bending over a bucket. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, works well.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop, I have never liked to mop, it is a pain, and with the old-style mops you had all the strings coming off all the time. And then there’s the sponge mop that is almost as bad with the little bits of sponge flaking off while you work. This mop works well and, what I love the most is that you do not have to buy the disposable mop pads for it, you just throw them in the wash and then reuse...much more economical.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and quality
customer_reviews.text: This mop has already lasted me much longer than most others. With all the extras and the quality I am much happier with this mop. The extra pads and bottle really are essential so I am thankful they were included. The quality is great, the plastic bottles aren't extremely sturdy but everything else is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike&Michaela

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after only 5 uses. Spraying mechanism just stopped working. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina S

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made, very easy to use and I really like that I can use my own non-chemical cleaning solution. Plus, the pads are washable, keeping those disposable other brand pads out of the landfills! This is a win for those of us who are environmentally conscious. A+
customer_reviews.author: Xorri

customer_reviews.title: Love this mop
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, extra accessories, trigger spray. This does everything I want. Needing a mop in-between steaming my plank vinyl floors, this allows you to use any cleaner. The spray is fine and even. The pad scrubs well. The handle is long and it easily stands against a cabinet without tipping over. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: LLLL

customer_reviews.title: I need a mop that sprays and bottles that remove from it. thanx..djones... dfj52@hotmail.com....
customer_reviews.text: love this mop...but, bottle will NOT remove the way it is suggested. I have not had it very long, but easy to use, and great for quick cleanups,i,e, spillage, dog missing the pp-pad . I am disappointed about the squirt bottle, as it is much more convenient. work done? throw the cleaning pad right into the washing machine .....thank you for helping me out. donna jones dfj52@hotmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Donna F. Jones

customer_reviews.title: works great, the spray is nice and wide with good ...
customer_reviews.text: works great, the spray is nice and wide with good distance. i like the manual hand pump on the handle and not having to worry about batteries, however i just hope it continues to work over time. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dj Onion

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the mop until it started to fall apart. After only a couple of uses, the bottle cap split and began leaking. Then the area that holds the bottle broke when I knocked the mop over. Every time I used it bits and pieces fell off. So much of the mop has fallen off that it is no longer usable. I have a steam cleaner so this was only used for spot cleaning. I don't think it would last more than a month or two if it were used regularly.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great until it’s not
customer_reviews.text: The two pieces that connect the sprayer and the bottle that make the pole no longer stay connected. Everything else about it has been great. The pads it comes with, the bottles, the ease of use. But now it’s nearly useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Works well for 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I replaced my floors with laminate and I could no longer use my steam mop. One of the reasons I purchased this mop over similar ones is because they stated it had a lifetime warranty. Well my mop started leaking after 1 year of weekly use. I emailed them 3 weeks ago asking about a replacement since it has a lifetime warranty. All I have heard is crickets. No contact from them at all. So, if you expect to replace it every year, buy this mop.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mop kit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mop kit. The bottle like others say, is seemingly difficult to remove, however just follow the directions and it pops right off. No issues with anything so far. Have repeatedly washed two of the three pads it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: BullitBird

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy to place and remove the pads. I don't use the sprayer aspect with cleaner, although it works just fine, I find Id rather spray cleaner (mostly in the kitchen) and let it sit a min rather then spray as I mop. I do keep clean water in the sprayer for areas for a clean rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and easy!!
customer_reviews.text: This makes cleaning my wood floors much easier than carrying around a separate spray bottle with my mop!! I just fill the attached bottle with my Bona wood floor cleaner and off I go!! The only problem I have with it is that it's abit difficult to remove the bottle for refilling. It says "push and twist" to remove but it doesn't really twist. I just have to muscle it out of there!
customer_reviews.author: Carla K

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great just needs a bigger solution bottle, it's very small and won't do my entire kitchen without a refill. Other than that it works (also the pads) great.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: this is fantastic and it works very well
customer_reviews.text: Lifetime guaranty, are you kidding me, this is fantastic and it works very well. Extra pads and an extra refill bottle. No other company offers this. I am very pleased w/this product. This is what we used to be used to in this country. love it love it!
customer_reviews.author: guitsteve

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with cleaner only bottles to put your preferred cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: My only issue was the fact that the kit did not come with cleaner but bottles for your cleaner of choice. Other than this, the mop performs as well as others. I do like the washable pads, certainly cuts down on the necessity to buy pads in the future. Overall, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: C Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: I liked this mop okay until about the fourth use when the handle kept popping off the base. It’s made of cheap plastic which bends. The spray is also a little too much because it re-wets areas you’ve already mopped.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The handle connection and broke it is flimsy why don’t they put metal instead plastic
customer_reviews.author: Hfghgf

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. The idea of the product is a good one but the product itself is a dud. The bottle that holds the solution only sprays 10% of the time. I ended up mopping the floor by hand anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Swiffer be gone.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and quality build. Has lots of extra parts that help clean and helps save over buying Swiffer wipes. Just buy some Fabuloso and mix in some water and your kitchen is clean. The pads have a rough surface that helps clean the surfaces you need clean.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this mop
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mop! Just make sure you put it together correctly or the sprayer won't work. I had to re-assemble it after my sister said it didn't work. It works better than any spray mop I've owned. I have 9 pets, so trust me, this is an awesome mop.
customer_reviews.author: T Glass

customer_reviews.title: Great Mop. Frustrating bottle attachment
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop. I just wish I read the reviews like I normally do before buying products. I STILL haven’t gotten the bottle out to refill it. I guess I’ll try again after reading the comments. If this method doesn’t work I’ll just have to switch to another brand. Other than that flaw this is amazing. My floors were nice and sparkly. Without being streaky.
customer_reviews.author: Soraya Mayard

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning floors!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect mop for quick touch ups, full cleaning and shinning laminate floors. The refillable bottles, a great idea. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: AnnaPG

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with handle, plastic pin holding it in place breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought one, however it broke. Plastic pin holding the handle snapped, I am not sure why. Otherwise product is OK, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Very good mop
customer_reviews.text: Nice mop. Containers are small, but there are two of them. The pads are great quality. The first mop I ordered was defective, but the company made it right in a hurry. Really like the product, and I love the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. Totally replacing my wet swifter and I feel ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Totally replacing my wet swifter and I feel so much better about the decreased wasted consumables. The spray mechanism takes a second to figure out- I had to snap the handle on again after the first spray, but after that worked like a charm. I would say you should spray at rest and then mop- don't spray while you are moving the mop. That should make it work like a charm! A+ product
customer_reviews.author: ct

customer_reviews.title: Weak Spray
customer_reviews.text: The mop and design are great, but it doesn't spray well. I have to apply pressure to the bottle each time I want to spray to get much to come out. Not sure if I got a bad bottle or what but seems like it's not working how it was designed to.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: The mop works wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my new bamboo hardwood floor. I use Bona floor cleaner in mine. The mop works wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Beats Swiffer!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Beats the swiffer every time. Awesome feel in the hands. Awesome spray. Love that I can put whatever chemicals in the bottle. Only con is the bottle is super small, but it makes the unit lightweight AND, you get 2 bottles and 3 wipe clothes.
customer_reviews.author: pappaof2

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and mop!
customer_reviews.text: The mop works great and is super easy to us. The customer service of the seller is amazing and they were great at solving an issue I had with the mop. Definitely purchase if you are looking for a refillable mop that works great!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie R.

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need
customer_reviews.text: The pads that come with these are great on tile. Easy to spray. The pods are really hard to get out sometimes though and the handle seems a little flimsy but does what I need it to. I wish you could order pads and pods separate though.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 2+4 animals

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made - but it does the job. Very plastic feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great! Its been a couple months now and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Its been a couple months now and it has held up nicely. I love how you can put your own soap in it. The pads are easily machine washable, and the price is great! I highly recommend this mop!
customer_reviews.author: JJ Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mop. It is very sturdy. The mop pad surface is very large. It is a good quality product. My only complaint is that the solution bottle is smaller than previous mops that I have used. However, I do still highly recommend this product and have even ordered a second one for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: daabaoruukokpl

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop!! Its good quality and cleans so well. I have quite a few different microfiber pads and they all fit well. Be really careful with the bottle though, the instructions are not accurate for some reason. You need to squeeze and gently push down/pull up.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Slightly smaller version of rubbermaid
customer_reviews.text: This is slightly smaller but also cheaper version of the Rubbermaid. Well worth it and you can always use the Rubbermaid pads on here.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service! Love this map cleans great but it had a malfunction and quit working and the company took care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottles difficult to remove
customer_reviews.text: Like the concept I used Mr’s Meyers cleaner with 1/2 water. I have arthritis and had to give the unit away because I wasn’t able to disengage the bottle
customer_reviews.author: ZenLala

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Light mop specially for people with severe body aches.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it will come with a pad that can scrub hard where there is tuff stains instead of bending to scrub it with a spatula.
customer_reviews.author: Evy

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I was going through a swiffer a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I was going through a swiffer a year and I had to use their fluid. This is perfect because you can use whatever cleaner you want and washable cleaner pads.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Nice mop until it began leaking
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable mop especially compared to another brand that my sister bought on Amazon. Wish the bottles were bigger. I've used it a lot and it worked great until this little piece came off and made the cleaner leak through.
customer_reviews.author: My Melody

customer_reviews.title: I expected better than a year
customer_reviews.text: At a year old it started leaking. All of the fluid leaks out in just a couple of minutes. I bought extra pads etc. and I'm not sure for what. I expected better than a year.
customer_reviews.author: ReNe'e

customer_reviews.title: Better material needed
customer_reviews.text: Its wonderful while it works... broke in half while mopping :(... Lasted 1 year..
customer_reviews.author: Via

customer_reviews.title: Spray mop is leaking after less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this spray mop on June 2nd and it is already broken (the cleaning solution leaks on to the top of the mop head and all over my floors). This is a piece of junk that I can't return!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: The lever to activate the spray function broke before I even had an opportunity to use the mop. The entire mop is obviously very cheaply made - spend an extra $15 and get something that will last more than one use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I used this just once and the spray doesnt work anymore plus the handle dividing in the middle.it doesn't stick to its other half as it is suppose to.Im just dissapionted.
customer_reviews.author: Bebeto

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in October 2017 and used it until February 2018 If you want a great clean for 8 or so times then it’s a great product After that the cheap plastic gives away and it broke on the hinge Please save your money and buy something more durable
customer_reviews.author: Apurva Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I wish it came with more pads but they are easy to wash and reuse. Sometimes I just wash them in the sink if I don’t want to wait for a load of laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Sara McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: The mop is great, but the stick is always falling out
customer_reviews.text: The mop is great, but the stick is always falling out. I did use super glue to stick it in. But overall, I love this product. I also but one for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana_2017

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it!! Easy to use and I get to pick the cleaners to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but not very well built. I love that it has an extra container for cleaning solution but the handle is not very sturdy at all. It broke within me using it 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie McNeish

customer_reviews.title: A lot cheaper than the Swiffer and I love that you have your choice of cleaning fluid to ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot cheaper than the Swiffer and I love that you have your choice of cleaning fluid to put in the bottles...
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: One bottle was cracked at seam on delivery
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles was cracked upon delivery...lucky there are 2 but I have 2 different types of floors & was looking forward to keeping wood cleaner in 1 & tile cleaner in the other
customer_reviews.author: Tim Carroll

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it... I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. The microfiber pads really work wonders and the wide mop piece makes cleaning much faster! I use the mrs. Myers products to make everything smell like fresh flowers!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Renee Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Broke Too Soon
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it in July, and it broke September. I really like this product because it comes with a brush, 2 bottles and easy to clean my apartment floor. I will try to purchase one more time and see how long will the mop last, hopefully not only 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Rio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that you can use your own cleaner, or just plain water. Works Great
customer_reviews.author: G. Tagan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer mechanism broke after a few months of use and the liquid just leaks out now.
customer_reviews.author: Visosky

customer_reviews.title: Works but doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well, but broke a couple of months after I received it. Light use and the plastic sides that hold the solution broke making it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great.. just seems like reminding to some people in the house.. lol
customer_reviews.author: John M Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Does it's job well. And better value than Swiffer wet jet.
customer_reviews.author: anessa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no more bending down. Now, we'll see about longevity.
customer_reviews.author: itguy

customer_reviews.title: It east to brake
customer_reviews.text: I really loved cleaning with it but i was cleaning my kichen an it brake the hold button come to practice. Very disappointed but i will nuy it again i love it
customer_reviews.author: Nichola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I use it for my tile floors with bleach water and my wood floors with a wood cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk! Snapped in half my second time using. I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Michael wing

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, thank you for the replacement mop. It’s working out for us much better for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: lenchik

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made junk stopped working after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product along with extra pads hoping for a positive experience based off of reviews. I first noted that it was extremely thin & flimsy but on first use it worked pretty good. The 2nd time i went to use it, it wouldnt spray. Took the bottle off & saw liquid had seemed in the nozzle. Shook it out, made sure nothing was clogged, resnapped the bottle into place & still nothing. Its basically like a swiffer ends up after a month but only after once use. Itd be cheaper to just buy a new swiffer every month then waste money on this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: CynMcC

customer_reviews.title: Broke on me first time using it
customer_reviews.text: It was good till 5 minutes after using it it started broke on me it is really good at cleaning just not that great at staying in one piece
customer_reviews.author: Nikolas

customer_reviews.title: It's a good concept and nice and light
customer_reviews.text: It's a good concept and nice and light. However, it broke after only a couple uses. It now leaks horribly and empties it's contents too quickly to be of much use.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

product_meta.title: Homevative Household Microfiber Spray Mop Kit /w 3 pads, 2 bottles, and Precision Detailer. Floor push mop for Wood, Laminate, Tile and more. No need for buckets or other supplies.
feature_bullets: SAVE MONEY - Two refillable bottles allow you to fill your own solution and save money from buying costly disposables. 3x reusable carbon fiber microfiber pads can be washed over 100 times. That's a savings of more than 60$ for every pad you use*. Lastly, no need for batteries as you have more control with a manual spray handle.

SAVE TIME - The responsive spray head allows you to spray as much or as little liquid as you desire. Save unnecessary time and frustration moping up unwated water. Add in our 360° swivel head and get around bulky, heavy furniture without the headache of moving it all around.

NO STRESS, NO LEAK DESIGN - The Homevative microfiber spray mop has forteified silicon rings at all stress points to stop water from leaking out. The lightweight aluminum shaft and ergonomically designed spray handle allow for seamless use. Lastly, the "one-turn" bottle removal system is frustration free.

SAVE THE ENVIRONMENT - Feel good knowing that you are decreasing harmful waste vs competitors that use expensive and excessive disposables. We created our mop to clean the world, not add more garbage.
Please remove the bottle by pulling it straight out of the mop.
